Summary: a bright object descended really fast then flew a straight line fast
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving along Champlain blvd. in LaSalle Montreal. I noticed a plane in the sky but also another object beneath it. My first thought was that it was a helicopter, but it was really going fast. The plane was flying at 45-50 degrees above the object was like 25-30 degrees above the horizon. This object descended really fast like it just dropped, to about 10 degrees above the horizon and flew at a really fast clip to the north. I watched it for about 3-4 minutes before it disappeared beneath the horizon. I kept thinking that I don't recall planes flying that low at that speed over a city. Just wonder if anyone else saw this.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There were no other sightings in Montreal on or around May 7th 2013
